scripts.build: rm -rf dist && pnpm build:types && pnpm build:js && pnpm build:cli
scripts.build:cli: esbuild src/cli/bin.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/cli/bin.js --external:fsevents --external:chokidar --external:glob --external:esbuild --banner:js='import { createRequire } from "module"; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); import { fileURLToPath } from "url"; const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); import { dirname } from "path"; const __dirname = dirname(__filename);' --external:events --external:path --external:fs --external:util --external:stream --external:os --external:assert --external:url
